Title:

THE FOOD DEHYDRATING BIBLE: Grow It. Dry It. Enjoy It! by Brett L. Markham


Description (courtesy of Amazon):

Bestselling author of the Mini Farm series, self-sufficiency expert Brett Markham turns his attention to the timeless art of food dehydrating.
An avid food dryer for years, Brett walks you through the simple steps for dehydrating everything from traditional classics like apples and jerky to more unusual fare. Whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re following a raw food lifestyle or looking for new ways to make the most of your gardenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s produce, this is an inside look at all aspects of dehydrating.

The Food Dehydrating Bible includes:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Straightforward, easy easy-to to-follow instructions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dozens of recipes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Diagrams
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One hundred color photographs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And more!

This is a must-have manual for beginners and dehydrating gurus alike!
